"Ugh...it feels so weird." you mumbled to yourself, even with that slowly growing feeling of actually liking the garment.

"H-Hi." you said back, getting all nervous again. This was really irritating to be honest. You used to be quite chummy with Robert, and now you couldn't do much other than blush.

You could even see all the knots you had smoothing out, until they were just flowing as if you took care of it daily.

"Great..." you sighed.

"Oh...nothing.." you shook your head, not wanting him to get involved with this.

You inadvertently gave a shy smile. Whatever was affecting you obviously weren't affecting Robert, as he seemed completely oblivious to your newfound emotions. But what? As you looked around the class, trying to keep your attention away from Robert, you looked up at your hair. It may had been untangled, but it was starting to get in the way. You looked down to your torso, seeing your t-shirt beginning to tighten slightly around your body. It didn't get tight or anything, but still much more conforming. Your short sleeves began climbing down your arms, covering them all the way down to your wrists as they began taking on a lavender color. As if to add more to it, you felt a bit more skin being exposed around your neckline, which even showed a bit of the sports bra underneath. In the end, it was a lavender long-sleeved shirt that now adorned you.

Now all of your clothes were girly, except for the male underwear you still wore underneath the skirt.

"Sigh.....thank goodness Robert and the others aren't laughing." you said to yourself. It was nice not having to explain yourself though that failed to address your worries of what to do.

And then....the bell rung! That signaled the end of this class.

"Well...catch you later Ad!" Robert smiled, giving a small wave back. Before you could even help it, you gave a soft and shy smile, waving back a bit before you shook your head.

At home, the first thing you do is get started on your homework. Unlike in class, you're able to concentrate just fine, and you get it done in a decent amount of time. You don't realize yet that in class you were distracted by Robert's presence, and the girl you're becoming is fairly intelligent normally - not the best student, but far from stupid.

With your homework done, your attention turns again to what's happening to you. You look around your room and find to your frustration that all your clothes have changed into clothes appropriate for a teenage girl. They're all rather modest, but that doesn't mean much right now; and there isn't a single pair of pants in your room, just skirts and dresses (plenty of different tops, though). You groan in frustration. How the hell is this happening, and more importantly, how can you stop it?
12111121111112212232112232.title: As time goes on

121111211111122122321122322.content:
Eventually, after your work, you were called down for dinner. Thankfully, it was about the usual for a family meal, listening to your parents talk about their day, occasionally asking about your own. You kind of answered vaguely in return, which in all honesty was kind of how you usually acted anyway. However, your mom did bring up how gymnastics practice was, surprising you a bit though you supposed that was a sign of how things were changed. Again, you just said it was okay. It was just one of those days.

"Sigh.....I'm beat.."

You said that as you entered your room, closing the door as you were getting ready for bed. You still had zero idea what was going on. Heck, for a minute, you tried a Google search but that predictably yielded no viable results. This whole phenomenon just seemed so random and there was no way to trace it anywhere. Such a thing frustrated you.

"So annoying." you groaned as you brushed your teeth, meanwhile taking the scrunchie out of your hair. That allowed your long blonde hair to fall past your shoulders, still about as neat and straight as before. Testing it a bit, you could see that it went at least to the top of your back, definitely longer than any guy's hair at your school. Sighing again, you finished that up and went back to your room.

In the same spot as your normal pajamas, you found instead a nightgown. You had hoped to at least see some pajama pants or something, but apparently this girl you were becoming had no pants of any kind. Great, as if this wasn't frustrating enough. It was white in color of course, and was at least somewhat comforting as you slipped it on. It still looked kind of weird on your strange body. You had some girly traits, but still many male ones left on you. Well, that was a thought process for another time. You were tired.

"Well....guess I'll have to wait to see what happens next." you nodded to yourself as you slipped into your bed, turning the lights out.

*****Dream*****

The place you were in was loud with the crowd there, cheering from every direction. It looked like a stadium of sorts, but you did't have much time to see much of it. The reason why was because you were moving so much. Suddenly, you dipped every which way, be it upside down or sideways. Were those...gymnastic thing? Like the balance beam? That was there, and at one point you could see yourself hanging upside down on it.

"Go Ad!" You heard a cry, hearing Rachel's voice from nearby. You could turn your head to see her cheering, which seemed to get you going even faster.

The scene then shifted to you on what seemed like a floor, jumping and flipped elegantly. By the time it was done, you could actually feel how tired you were, but that seemed interupted when you saw Robert nearby, also cheering you on. Just the sight of him seemed to spur you towards him, right in to his arms, even hearing some words over the PA as your lips were nearing his.

"And here are your State Champions....!"

*****End Dream*****

Jolted awake by your dream, you sat up in bed, but you didn't dare open your eyes, as you were too afraid of what you were going to find. Not only your room had changed slightly, with your walls becoming a pale cream color, and your study desk had become a vanity (even though it was still functionally a study desk), you've had some physical changes too. Your unpainted nails were slightly past your fingertips, and the room seemed slightly larger.

12111121111112212232112232213.content:
You knew you had to get rid of this curse, or whatever it was that was changing you soon, else you'd end up fully female. Even though pretending to be sick was something you never really did, you knew that discovering the source of the changes had to be your only priority.

"I don't feel too good, mom" you moaned.

"What's wrong, Ad? Do you want to go to the doctor?" mom asked as she came into your room, followed by Josh, who was nearly ready for his own day at school.

While tempting, you knew if even mom saw you as a girl, so would the doctors, so it would kind of defeat the whole purpose of going there. "I should be okay if I rest up."

"This isn't like you, Adele. That time of the month?" mom asked, still concerned.

"Mom!" you protested, equally embarrassed and horrified by the thought. Embarrassing that she would actually talk about something like that in front of Josh, and horrifying that she thinks your 'sickness' is due to extreme cramps, or whatever happens during a girl's period. You didn't know, and you didn't want to find out. Plus her comments could focus your changes into that particular direction. Your protests seemed to confirm in mom's mind that you were having a bad time. "You know were the pills are, Ad. I'll leave you alone, but I want you to rest up."

"Okay, mom" you said, wincing, though you had no intent of just lying down. Mom and Josh left you alone, but not without mom saying to Josh in a quiet, but still audible voice, "Your sister might be a tomboy, but you have to remember she still is a girl."

Adam rushed down the hall in a desperate attempt to escape from this nightmare. Don’t wanna be a girl. Why’s this happening to me? Why?! On the way, he bumped into a cute girl and they both fell over on the ground.

“Ow, you should really watch where you’re going,” she said.

“Sorry,” he gave her a hand getting up from the ground.

“It can’t be stopped,” she muttered.

“What did you say?” He asked.

“You know what I’m talking about. It can’t be stopped. I used to be like you,” she coldly said.

“You did? Who were you? What happened?” He asked.

“Can’t say. It won’t allow attachments to our former selves. What I might have been is irrelevant. Remember, you’re a girl. That’s all that matters. Please... listen to me... I don't want to see another one vanish...” she said.

“What?” he shouted.

“If you resist, your old memories, interests and every fragment of your personality will fade away. Sorry, but you have to embrace it,” she sighed.

“B…But…” he said.

“You’re becoming a girl in body and mind. If you embrace it, it’ll likely only change your mind enough for you to be comfortable as a girl, including getting your ne- Whoops, real memories. This is your reality now, whatever you might have been is irrelevant,” she said.

“Do you know what’s causing this?” He asked.

“Of cou- Sorry. I’m not allowed to say. Just think of what you thought as your old life as a strange dream and that you’re finally waking up,” she sighed.

“Can’t say? Will it punish you or something?” he asked before he realised how stupid his question was. Oh. Wouldn’t it start eating her memories or whatever it does? Is she not even allowed to think of opposing it? What sort of godlike force am I dealing with here?

Oh and, embracing it includes embracing your newfound attraction to men. You don’t have to date them, if you don’t want to. Remember, you’re a girl. Embrace it.”

"To be honest, I can hide them better than the Flats, because the colour of these are quite close to my jeans and blend it. Also, it would be more comfortable for me to wear because the Flats look uncomfortable...."

You go to put the Uggs on as Janice nodded, thinking the logic behind that. "Yeah....flats are uncomfortable....wait until you get into heels, Ad!" she remarked cheekily, giggling a little. Instead of thinking what Janice had said was weird, you giggled as well.

"Yep! Those will be a pain!" you commented back happily, without noticing two weird things. The first, why on earth would you say that when you're not a girl? The second thing is that you didn't notice how high your voice has become. Your normal voice is quite deep but now somewhat higher in your voice range. How on earth did you know notice that?

But anyway, the Uggs that you chose are now on your feet. You frown to yourself, feeling somewhat uncomfortable as they're a bit small. But, the Flats looked more uncomfortable, so you guess this is the lesser of two evils.

Janice grinned. "Well, you look absolutely fabulous in those Uggs, darling!" she complimented dearly, somewhat gussing over you. Despite the fact you should feel weird about, instead you grin.
"Ah, thanks! They really suit me!" you replied, feeling sheepishly. Shaking the odd feeling off, you begin to head to the door. "Thank you for letting me borrow the Uggs, Janice!"
Janice chuckled a little. "Hey, hey! That's Ms Red to you, young lady!" she teased lightly. You grin as you exit the door.

Once you're out of the door and out of view, you take a moment to think what Janice had said. "'Young lady...." you think, confused on why she would say that. "I've known Janice for a long time now....She wouldn't call me that...."
Concluding that you miss-heard her, you decided to head to break, as P.E took up periods. As you walked along, you felt your feet becoming more and more comfortable in the Uggs, becoming a perfect fit. Unknowing to you, your feet have shrunken a little, going from a size 9 for a man to a size 6 for a woman, changing you even more.

What happens next?
121111211111122211.title: "I'll take the Uggs."

1211112111111222111.content:
You head into the cafeteria, where despite it not being lunch, plently of students are gathered in the hall. You look around the hall and see that Robert, Rachal and Sophie are sat on a table, with Jason sat there as well.
Smiling to yourself, you walk over to the table, swinging your hips a teeny tiny more than usual, with them expanding out a centimeter. Hey, if you're (the reader, not the actually character of 'you'!) thinking is your (the character) hips are expanding at a very slow rate, this story is called 'SLOWLY CHANGING' for a reason!

But anyway, moving away from the fourth wall being broken, you take a seat down next to Rachel. Normally, you would sit next to Robert, but recently you feel more closer to Rachel and not in the romantic sense.
"Hey, Ad!" Rachel goes, all cheerfully and girly. "How was P.E?" You smile, glad to see one of your best friends.
"It was great! How about you?" you question sincerely. As Rachel explains how her P.E went, your eyes seem to wander over to Robert and Jason, especially more of Jason.

Standing at 6 foot 4, Jason is one of the most attractive boys in the school, along with being the oldest. Handsome features such a chiseled jawline along with black hair, blue eyes and strong muscles and a six-pack, it's impossible to imagine that the majority of girls in the school are not in love with him. In fact, the other day, you swore you saw some girls swoon when he winked at him.

A nice, warm feeling came over your face, slightly tingling it. It appears that this small, warm feeling has caused all of your facial hair, which was pretty short to begin with, to retract into your face and disappear.

Rachel stopped talking, looking at the fact you're not paying attention and that you're looking at Jason. She grins, happily.
"Heh, do Ad have a crush on someone?" she teased lightly at you. You quickly snap your head towards Rachel, blushing in embarrassment.
"N-n-no!" you go, despite the fact you should crushing on Rachel instead. "I-i-it's not like that!"
Rachel giggled, causing you to feel even more embarrassed. All in the meantime, you felt some tingling down at your feet, but you ignored it. But what you didn't know is that the hair on your feet have, like your facial hair, have retracted into your feet and disappeared from existence.

Calming down, you go to chat with Rachel when she notices your Uggs. "Oh, sweet! Where did you get those Uggs?" she questioned, seriously. "They look so good on you!"
You then frowned. "I had to get them from lost property. My shoes disappeared!" you replied, somewhat annoyed. Rachel gasped to responded to that.
"They did? They might have been stolen!"

"What do you mean?" you asked back, confused. Rachel looked round and came closer to whisper in your eye. Despite the fact you have a crush on Rachel, you don't seem to blush.
"There's been a rumour of a shoe thief going around the school recently...." she whispered carefully. "Some of the girls think a boy with a foot fetish is sneaking into the girl's changing room to steal our shoes.....Maybe that's what happened to your shoes?"

You nodded, to agree with this. You unknowingly dismiss the fact that Rachel might think that you're a girl! Rachel leans back out, and smiled. "Well, I think for next time you should hide an extra pair of shoes. You're lucky that a pair of gorgeous Uggs were in lost property!"

You grinned to this, but then Rachel went to ask something. "Hey, you free this weekend?"
"Yeah, why?" you questioned back, curious.

"Well....." Rachel started, with a grin. "Do you...."
1211112111111222111.title: Meeting up with friends

12111121111112221111.content:
You blink in surprise from Rachel's question, somewhat bewildered by it. You would never expect Rachel to ask you that! After all, being invited to a sleepover with Rachel and any other girls who would attended is a dream come true for any boys!

But, now that you think about it, the idea of going over to Rachel's for a sleepover actually seems pretty normal to you, like you've done it several times before. This is due to your memories being changed a little, making you thinking Rachel's sleepover are normal. For some strange reason now, when you think about it, all the previous sleepovers that you've had with Rachel and the girls, you've been a girl as well despite the fact you're a boy!

Shaking that odd fact off your mind, you grin a pearly white grin. "Yeah!" you go, getting excited. "I would love to go!"
"Great!" Rachel started, happily. "The sleepover is tomorrow, at my place as usual! Prepare for a night of movies, make-up, truth or dare and everything else, Adele!"

Taken aback by what Rachel called you, you were about to reprimand her for that when suddenly the bell went off for lessons. Dismissing the fact that Rachel called you a girl's name, you said your goodbyes for now, as you head to your lessons. As you were about to head over to them, you pause for a second and glance over to Robert and Jason, who were heading to the same lessons as each other. Staring at the two, you smile to yourself warmly, gaining a bit of a blush before heading over to your lessons.
....
....
....
....
Jumping over to the next night...
....
....
....
....
You stand in front of Rachel's house, somewhat nervously with a backpack on your back, ready for Rachel's sleepover at about 7:30PM. Despite the fact that you've been changing constantly over the last three days, since you've saw Rachel last, you haven't had another change. BUT....since the plot demands it, the changes shall begin again!

You're currently wearing a blue t-shirt, brown jeans and the Uggs that you got from lost property, and you have your hair down near your shoulders but not quite touching them. Despite the fact you have a pair of A-Cup breasts, they're actually still small enough to wear a t-shirt and not get notice. But, due to the size of the black sports bra that you're wearing, they're going to be much bigger, MUCH bigger.

But, I digress. For some reason, you feel nervous the fact you've done this before several times. You feel weird, like you've been here before but you swear you haven't. You decided to head over to Rachel's door and knock on it.

After a few seconds, Rachel opens the door, wearing some pink pajamas. She grins on the sight of you and jumps and hugs you. "YOU'RE HERE!" she yelled excitedly, as she pulls out of the hug and squeal with joy.
"Ah, this is going to be so much fun!" she remarked. Rachel glances at your bag and sighs. "Heh, always the prepared one, Ad? You can place it down there!"

Rachel points towards a spot where another bag is placed. "Only Sophie could come as well! The rest of the girls were busy...."
You frown as you put your bag down. "Ah, that's a shame. Where's Sophie, by the why?"
Rachel grinned. "She's in the kitchen! Follow me!"

As you begin to follow Rachel, you feel your hair tingle a little, feeling it tickle your shoulders. Unknowing to you, your hair has increase in length again, now going past your shoulders to the top of your back. Despite of the increasing length, it still has a lot more to grow.

You enter the kitchen with Rachel, which Sophie standing there looking at her phone whilst wearing some light blue pajamas. Racheal turns round to you and asked: "What do you want to do first after you change into your pajamas? Makeover or movies?"

You think for a moment and then reply:
12111121111112221111.title: "....want to have a sleepover?"

121111211111122211111.content:
After getting changed into some pajamas, which are red shorts and a black top (you removed the sports bra as well. No one seems to notice your A-Cup breasts anyway), you head into the main room with Sophie and Rachel and sit down on the floor, preparing for the makeover.

"All right, Ad!" Sophie declares, grinning, with different types of makeup across the floor. You could see lipstick, eyeliner and various different shades of nail polish besides Sophie. "What do you want to do first?"

You take a moment to think to yourself before pointing at the nail polish. "Let's do our nails first! It's been a while since I did my toes so why not now?" you replied, with the odd feeling of never having done your toes before being shoved out of your head.

Sitting down and putting your feet forward, you let Rachel and Sophie do your toenails. Picking all sorts of colours, such as purple, blue and red, the two girls carefully painted your toenails. Unbeknowing to them or you, your leg hair slowly but surely begins to retract into your leg. Since you didn't have much leg hair to begin with, it doesn't take much time before the hair on your legs completely disappear, leaving your legs completely hair free.

Speaking of legs, your leg suddenly become extremely smooth, more feminine like then the roughness of a boy's leg. Your feet also become smooth as well, while the soles of your feet become soft, if walking on soft pillows. Lastly, the bottom parts of your pajama shorts has extended a bit. Instead of being above your knees, your pajama shorts are now at the same length as your knees.

"Done!" Rachel exclaimed as she and Sophie finished painting your toenails. You look at them and smile to yourself. "It's perfect!" you said, with a slightly higher pitch tone. You look at the girls. "So, who's next?"

1211221121.content: It had been a pretty uneventful evening and even though the others had mentioned something about a movie, you weren't really in the mood for a shoot out. The walls still seemed light blue in your room as you went to get ready for bed, but maybe they always had, and you still couldn't smell any paint. Looking over at the other side of the room, the bag and shoes are where you left them, on the floor next to the fold-out sofa. The bag still had all your stuff in it but you couldn't be bothered to transfer it over now. Pulling on your PJs, a straight fringe flops down to just above your eyes, you can see it but its not obscuring your vision, "yeah I guess it is time for a trim" you say out loud climbing into bed. After what seemed like half an hour, you sit up, no matter how hard you try you just can't get comfortable. It was too hot. Throwing the cover on the floor you try again, no use. You decide to go open the window wide and then try to get some sleep. info.description:
Main character is Adam, a tall (about 6 foot 3), 16 year old boy with longish dirty blond hair (goes just past ears), blue/grey eyes, still at secondary school and does a variety of sports.
Josh - younger brother, 13, average height, brown hair
Robert - best friend, not athletic but not fat, brown gelled hair (also 16)
Rachel - crush, tall (5 foot 11), one month younger, at same school doing same subjects but in different classes, slightly lighter (and longer) hair, brown/green eyes, does most of the same sports as Adam as well but does not feel the same way and has made it painfully obvious on several occasions.
Sophie - her best friend, average height, long straight brown hair, 17 years old.

More characters can be added, but try to keep these the main ones!
Try to keep sex to a minimum, or at least don't go into any great detail

One day, Adam wakes up and something feels different, but what?...
